alert.note: Alert for Creek; Osage; Pawnee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 7:37PM CDT until April 23 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Creek County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southern Pawnee County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Glencoe, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Cleveland... Mannford... Oilton... Jennings... Westport... Osage... Hallett... Blackburn... Terlton... Maramec... Silver City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
